{{Wired embedded system |brand=SonicWALL |model=TZ 180 |revision=(APL17-048) |asin= |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=uncommon |est_release_date= |fcc_date=03/06/2007 |fcc_id=QWU-046 |pcb_id= |type=router, security appliance |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.66 |pwr_conn= |cpu1_brand=Cavium |cpu1_model=CN220;NITROX Soho 220; |cpu1_cspeed=200 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Samsung |fla1_model=K8D6316UTM-PI07 |fla1_num=2 |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Mira |ram1_model=P3V56S30ETP |ram1_num=4 |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes,, console port,, RJ45 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=IC+ |eth_chip2_model=IP101A |eth_chip3_brand=IC+ |eth_chip3_model=IP101A |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model=88E6063 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=5 |wan_speed=100M |wan_ports=2 |addl_chips=Multichannel RS-232 Line Driver;Texas Instruments;MA3232C;;1; |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|SonicWALL Internet Security Appliance}}
:The board is based on a chipset manufactured by [http://www.cavium.com Cavium], :which utilizes [http://www.cnusers.org/wrapper/Product_table.html ''Cavium's Nitrox Security Processor series'']. :The board uses passive cooling, so it is silent, and has :128MB of RAM plus 16MB of Flash Memory.
